originalText.text: I had a great experience with Buckmiller and I would recommend for anyone’s sprinkler needs without reservation.  I found Buckmiller through a Google search and connected with Carlos, who has super helpful.  During a reno project we discovered a rusted/damaged sprinkler head that needed to be replaced. He came to my apartment and provided a quote (that I found to be reasonable), we then coordinated so that the repair was done at an optimal time during the reno. On the scheduled date, techs arrived on time and finished the work quickly, cleanly, and without any issues.  Everyone was pleasant to work with and very responsive. I’d highly recommend.

originalText.text: Our 10 apartment brownstone has been using Buckmiller Sprinkler for many years now, and they have always done an excellent job for us with their monthly inspection service as required by law, with any repairs as needed - including changing out all of the buildings sprinkler heads at the end of their service life. Their personnel are all very professional, and their prices are fair. - Highly Recommended.

Their personnel are all very professional, and their prices are fair. - Highly Recommended.

originalText.text: Buckmiller has been our Auto Sprinkler Service Company for over 20 years. They are very thorough and communicate well. We get all of our reports in a timely and clear manner. As technology improved for customer service they have embraced it and made it easier to understand and manage our system.

As technology improved for customer service they have embraced it and made it easier to understand and manage our system.

originalText.text: We highly recommend Buckmiller Automatic Sprinkler Company. They are professional and experienced and have handled everything that we have needed over the years. They quickly respond to any questions that we have and have coordinated and completed all paperwork, inspections and maintenance as needed. They are responsible and keep their scheduled appointments and are a pleasure to work with. We recommend them.

They are responsible and keep their scheduled appointments and are a pleasure to work with. We recommend them.

originalText.text: Buckmiller was recommended to me by a friend with a brownstone in the West Village a year and a half ago. I hired them for monthly sprinkler inspections in my UWS brownstone. Every month they show up on time, complete their inspections carefully and efficiently, and with a great attitude and pride in their work. They serve to protect me and my tenants, and give me great peace of mind. I recommend them without reserve.
